V_IDENTITY_Q1.description: If your provider approves your prescription request, your medication will be sent to your doorstep. Your order will be shipped in discreet packaging that never references Zealthy, pharmacies, or your prescription.

V_IDENTITY_Q2.header: Enter the last 4 digits of your social security.
V_IDENTITY_Q2.description: This will enable us to verify your identity, which is required by telemedicine law.
